暗棋1將保留給中低階手機使用,不再進行更版.更多全新功能請下載暗棋2.<p>遊戲特色：單人對電腦,同台雙人對打,支持平板電腦上顯示,多語系支援,圖像化棋子。<br>介紹：暗棋是由象棋演變出來的棋類遊戲，使用象棋半盤與棋子來進行的棋類遊戲，所以又稱半棋，它的規則簡單，由兩名玩家輪流翻棋與下棋。一開始棋子都蓋著，得逐一翻開才能知道該棋是什麼棋，故稱為暗棋。玩法比象棋簡單，縱使沒有象棋那般的深奧，但也有可能會因下錯一子而全盤皆輸！而選棋的運氣也左右了暗棋一定的勝敗，人人皆有機會，這也正是暗棋的迷人之處！隨時隨地來挑戰自己與朋友的棋力與手氣吧！</p><p>我們釋出軟體前會盡力去測試.但是Android的手機及型號種類非常多.請仁慈的Email提醒我們什麼步驟導致程式當掉.我們非常感謝您的了解與支持。</p><p>====================================<br>[简体中文介绍]<br>游戏特色：单人对电脑,同台双人对打,支持平板电脑上显示,多语系支援,图像化棋子。<br>介绍：暗棋是由象棋演变出来的棋类游戏，使用象棋半盘与棋子来进行的棋类游戏，所以又称半棋，它的规则简单，由两名玩家轮流翻棋与下棋。一开始棋子都盖着，得逐一翻开才能知道该棋是什么棋，故称为暗棋。玩法比象棋简单，纵使没有象棋那般的深奥，但也有可能会因下错一子而全盘皆输！而选棋的运气也左右了暗棋一定的胜败，人人皆有机会，这也正是暗棋的迷人之处！随时随地来挑战自己与朋友的棋力与手气吧！</p><p>我们释出软体前会尽力去测试.但是Android的手机及型号种类非常多.请仁慈的Email提醒我们什么步骤导致程式当掉.我们非常感谢您的了解与支持。</p><p>====================================<br>[English Most games last between ten and twenty minutes. It is a social game, usually played for fun rather than serious competition.</p><p>Don’t worry about the Chinese characters, for children and foreign friends, we design the image chess for you. href="/store/apps/details?id=com.androidfuns.mahjong.game" title="麻將連連看-免費版"> 15.    麻將連連看-免費版  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=FreeRancher" title="FreeRancher">FreeRancher</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.androidfuns.mahjong.game"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaJgokEiIKHGNvbS5hbmRyb2lkZnVucy5tYWhqb25nLmdhbWUQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  麻將連連看是一個圖案配對遊戲, 也稱為上海麻將或上海麻雀.<p>玩法：<br>遊戲目標是找出每對相同的麻將圖案，并消除這些麻將。只有圖案相同而且沒有其他麻將阻擋的麻將才能被消除，如果麻將的左方及右方同時有其它麻將, 或者上方有其它麻將, 則被阻擋而不能消除。</p><p>遊戲模式：<br>遊戲分限時模式及一般模式, 免費版及收費版的限時模式是一样的, 都必須在限定時間內消除所有麻將, 必須完成當前關卡才能解鎖下一關。<br>一般模式不限時間, 免費版只能試玩前三關。</p><p>在遊戲中，你可以用手指按住螢幕拖曳麻將的位置。如硬件支援多點觸控功能，你可以用兩個手拖放放大或縮小麻將，若不支援多點觸控功能, 可以用遊戲中的放大縮小工具放大或縮小麻將。</p><p>遊戲的自動儲存功能使你能隨時離開及返回遊戲。</p><p>免費版及收費版分別：<br>免費版有廣告, 收費版沒有廣告及解鎖所有一般模式中的關卡。</p><p>特色:</p><p>- 限時模式及一般模式<br>- 限時模式共有30關，由易到難。一般模式共有21關(免費版只能試玩前三關)<br>- 自動儲存遊戲<br>- 工具包括提示、重新洗牌、後退、自動縮放。<br>- 兩點觸控縮放(須硬件支援)<br>- 每關都是有解的(當然能否解決要看你的能力囉)<br>- 如硬件不技援多點觸控, 也可以用遊戲中縮放工具縮放<br>- 遊戲支援橫屏(Landscape)平及竪屏(Portrait)螢幕模式</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.androidfuns.mahjong.game" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  </div> </div>     <div class="reason-set"> 聚会玩 - 谁是卧底，杀人游戏  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=%E4%B8%8A%E6%B5%B7%E8%85%BE%E7%BF%80%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E7%A7%91%E6%8A%80%E6%9C%89%E9%99%90%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8" title="上海腾翀网络科技有限公司">上海腾翀网络科技有限公司</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.tengchong.juhuiwan"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIAoeEhwKFmNvbS50ZW5nY2hvbmcuanVodWl3YW4QARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  ***聚会玩是多人娱乐应用，一台设备大家一起玩，下载后请和好友一起体验游戏乐趣***<br>你是否是聚会“低头族”？大家聚一起却各自刷微博，一个个都像患上了“失语症”。 <br>你是否是桌游“日抛族”？每次聚会有人提议买扑克、桌游，最后都成了家中摆设。<br>经常不知道聚会的时候玩什么？难得聚在一起，每个人还在玩自己手机？ <p>有了聚会玩，这一切都不再是问题！让你和朋友轻松享受聚会乐趣！</p><p>* 已上线：天黑请闭眼（5人+），谁是卧底(3人+)，伙拼（2人），一愚惊人（4人+），大冒险（2人+），吹牛（2人+）</p><p>1. 经典推理游戏：天黑请闭眼（杀人游戏）适合5-16人<br>   被誉为最好用的法官工具，小白也能当好法官！</p><p>2. 史上最好玩，快乐大本营火爆游戏：谁是卧底 适合3-16人<br>   独创场景分类：根据词语特性进行分类，确保更对你的味！<br>   看词同时拍照，投票时再不用纠结号码，还可以将照片分享，独创忘词功能，随时跟上战况。<br> <br>3. 二人默契游戏：伙拼 适合2人<br>   充满合作与挑战的伙拼游戏，你在这头，我在那头，合伙拼出完整词语。<br>   无论情侣、闺蜜还是好基友，考验你们默契的时候到了，放马过来吧！</p><p>4. 热门桌游： 一愚惊人 适合4人以上<br>   按照游戏提示，一人使用语言、肢体、唇语、绘画描述词语，同队伙伴猜出词语。<br>   考验同队伙伴默契度，描述表演让游戏过程充满笑点！</p><p>5. 惩罚游戏：大冒险 适合2人以上<br>   邪恶的表情+奇葩的动作，为恶搞创造无限可能！</p><p>6. 最热骰子游戏：吹牛 适合2人以上<br>   KTV、酒吧最热门游戏！不用再操心骰钟不够，不用再趴在地上找骰子，也不需要再一个个的去数！<br> </span> </div>  <div class="description">  跳棋(波子棋)大戰一觸即發! 跳棋是大家必玩的童年經典遊戲!<br>懷念童年聚在一起玩跳棋的時光嗎? 看看誰跳得最快最遠 ?<p>這款跳棋界面簡潔，棋盤一目了然，玩法和傳統的跳棋一致!<br>立即和朋友家人玩玩! 集體回味，一起來重溫下兒時的經典遊戲！</p><p>簡介:<br>--------------------------------<br>中國跳棋，簡稱跳棋（香港稱為波子棋），是一種可以有二至六人同時進行的棋，棋盤為六星型，棋子分為六種顏色，每種顏色10枚棋子，每一位玩家佔一個角，擁有一種顏色的棋子。玩家每次動一枚棋子，全部棋子先到達對角那一邊的為贏家。</p><p>特點:<br>--------------------------------<br>* 玩法簡單! 刺激!<br>* 支援多人對戰 (1-6人)<br>* 可與 1-5個電腦對戰，並可選擇難度<br>* 傳統介面，經典玩法<br>* 多語言介面 (English/中繁/中简)<br>* 自動儲存遊戲進度<br>* 支援Apps2SD<br>* 完全免費!</p><p>跳棋的一些別名和相似的遊戲:波子棋,波子棋大戰,Chinese Checkers, 將棋（しょうぎ），又称日本象棋、亦稱本將棋（本，基本之意），是一种盛行于日本的棋類遊戲。<p>將棋的始祖可能是中国的宝应象棋或是從東南亞傳入的印度恰图兰卡，特別是與泰國象棋的相似性。在日本最早的紀錄是平安將棋，之後分支成小將棋、中將棋、大將棋、大大將棋、天竺大將棋、摩訶大大將棋、泰將棋、大局將棋等諸多日本將棋變體，傳說再由後奈良天皇改良小將棋，去除棋子醉象，成為現在流行的日本將棋。</p><p>SUD class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=SUD+Inc." title="SUD Inc.">SUD Inc.</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.ansangha.drchess"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHgocEhoKFGNvbS5hbnNhbmdoYS5kcmNoZXNzEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  國際象棋（英语：chess），又稱歐洲象棋或西洋棋，是一種二人對弈的戰略棋盘遊戲。國際象棋的棋盤由64個黑白相間的八乘八網格組成。這是世界上最流行的遊戲之一，世界各地數以百萬計的人在家中、俱樂部中、網路上以通信西洋棋或比賽的型式遊玩。<p>每位玩家一開始都各有16個棋子：一個國王、一個皇后、兩個城堡、兩個騎士、兩個主教和八個士兵。六種棋子的移動類型都不一樣。棋子是用來攻克對手的棋子，目標是將對方的國王處在不可避免的威脅之下以將死對方。除了將死，也可以透過對方自願性地投降而獲勝，通常會發生在大多數的棋子死亡或不可避免將死的時候。棋局也可以在一些情況下和局，導致沒有玩家獲勝。遊戲過程被區分作三個階段：國際象棋開局、國際象棋中局、西洋棋殘局。</p><p>SUD Inc.</p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.ansangha.drchess" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  </div> </div>     <div Merry Christmas to you all!</p><p>Review of Appgefahren:<br>"Vor wenigen Tagen wurde Mancala (Download-Link) im Play Store zum kostenlosen Download veröffentlicht.<br>Doch was bedeutete Mancala eigentlich? Wikipedia klärt auf: “Mancala (von arabisch ?? naqalah ‚bewegen‘) ist der wissenschaftliche Oberbegriff für bestimmte Spiele, die, meist von zwei Personen, vor allem in Afrika und Asien gespielt werden. Charakteristisch ist, dass bei ihnen Spielstücke, die in Mulden liegen, umverteilt werden“.<br>Auch hier müssen die kleinen Spielsteine so umverteilt werden, dass der Gegner am Ende keine Steine mehr besitzt. Eine In-App-Anleitung erklärt das Spielprinzip gut, auch wenn nur in englischer Sprache. Entweder man spielt alleine gegen den Computer oder fordert einen Freund heraus. Dass im Anschluss eingebundene Video zeigt einige Ausschnitte aus dem Spiel."</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" ==============如何玩==============<br>麻將傳說是一個免費的麻將遊戲基於一個經典中國遊戲（又名上海麻將，麻將台北，兄弟，麻將步道，或上海麻將）<br>該遊戲的目的是要消除所有的瓦片打在最快的時間，而試圖達到的最高得分。每個瓦片上有一個圖片，總共有43個不同的圖片。瓷磚必須選擇並跟圖片一樣的其他瓷磚匹配。每當你匹配兩個磚，它們都消失了，當所有的瓷磚都消失了，遊戲結束了。<p><br>==============特點==============<br>- title="中国跳棋 - 在线游戏大厅"> 60.    中国跳棋 - 在线游戏大厅  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=CronlyGames+Inc." title="CronlyGames Inc.">CronlyGames Inc.</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.cronlygames.cncheckers"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaJAoiEiAKGmNvbS5jcm9ubHlnYW1lcy5jbmNoZWNrZXJzEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  [重大更新，必须下载！] 以下新功能您绝对不想错过:<br>＊ 增加在线游戏大厅，可以跟大家一起网上跳跃；<br>＊ 增加落子提示，走子脚印等；<br>＊ 增加 隔空跳 选项;<br>＊ 优化现有的5种走子机器人算法；<br>绝无仅有，以上一切都是免费提供！<p>App Store最聪明的中国跳棋,全球超过100万次下载! iPhone版本也已上线,可以免费下载!</p><p>拥有5种不同的AI策略,支持1到6位选手同台竞技!</p><p>中国跳棋,简称跳棋(香港称为波子棋, 英语中 Chinese Checkers, Halma, Hop Jump),是一种可以有二至六人同时进行的棋,棋盘为六星型,棋子分为六种颜色,每种颜色10或15枚棋子,每一位玩家占一个角,拥有一种颜色的棋子,有时人数少的时候,也可以用每人两种颜色的棋子一起玩。</p><p>中国跳棋的前身是正方跳棋,大约出现在维多利亚时代,最初的棋盘是正方形的,共有256格,开始时棋子分布在四个角落,以最快跳到对角为目标,规则和现在的中国跳棋类同。不久就有人改成星形棋盘, 称为Stern-Halma。三十年代起在美国开始流行,并改了Chinese Checkers的名字。当这种棋子传到中国时,因为改以玻璃弹珠作棋子,因此亦被称为波子棋(玻璃弹珠粤语称为“波子”),实质上中国跳棋并不是起源于中国。</p><p>玩法</p><p>先将一种颜色的棋子全部放在一个角上,各人循顺时针或逆时针方向轮流走子,每次动一枚棋子,全部棋子先到达对角那一边的为赢家。棋子有两种走法:</p><p>   1)  一枚棋子移动到相邻六格其中一格。<br>   2) “搭桥”:自己的棋子(A)同一直线上有另一枚棋子(B),不限属于哪一方,大家之间没有任何棋子阻隔。如果B的另一方也没有棋子阻隔,A就可以跳到B的相反方向,而且和两枚棋子原来的距离一样。跳跃可以连续进行,直至跳无可跳为止。如果出现循环的话,可选其中一处停下。</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.cronlygames.cncheckers" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  </div> </div>     <div class="reason-set"> 支持人機對戰，兩人對戰，聯網對戰，藍牙、Wi-Fi聯機對戰。人機對戰可選擇多個難度級別。<br>2. 支持翻棋、佈局，暗棋、明棋共四種玩法。<br>3. 可以編輯、載入和保存佈局，並提供大量預置的參考佈局。<br>4. 佈局暗棋具有標誌對方棋子的功能。<br>5. 可以設置玩法細節：如由工兵還是最小的棋子挖地雷，大本營是否允許吃子等。<br>6. href="/store/apps/details?id=com.udi.junqi" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.udi.junqi" title="陸軍棋"> 74.    陸軍棋  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=xiaosea" title="xiaosea">xiaosea</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.udi.junqi"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaFwoVEhMKDWNvbS51ZGkuanVucWkQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  陸軍棋，又稱陸戰棋，簡稱軍棋，是中國近代的壹種兩人棋類，設計根據軍隊中的軍階。每壹方有25枚棋子，先奪得對方軍旗者為勝。<br>	勝負壹覽:<br>	1. 司令 &gt; 軍長 &gt; 師長 &gt; 旅長 &gt; 團長 &gt; 營長 &gt; 連長 &gt; 排長 &gt; 工兵<br>	2. 炸彈與任何棋子相遇時，雙方都消失<br>	3. 工兵 &gt; 地雷<br>	4. 地雷 &gt; 除炸彈和工兵以外的任何子粒<br>	棋盤:<br>	棋盤上每方有三十個停靠點，當中兩個為大本營，另有行營五個。 兩方勢力通過三條鐵路連接，每兩條鐵路之間有壹個“山界”。<br>	通用規則：<br>	當棋子在行營內對方不得攻擊。棋盤上有鐵路，沿鐵路無子阻擋時，直線行動不限格數，然除工兵外，皆不得拐彎。（另有版本謂除工兵外所有可動棋子在鐵路上最多只可走三步，但可拐彎。）<br>	大棋（軍階高的棋）可以吃小棋（軍階低的棋），同級相遇則同歸於盡。<br>	地雷不能動，工兵則可挖地雷。並且在鐵路上可以拐彎。<br>	炸彈可以動，遇上任何棋子（除軍旗）皆同歸於盡。<br>	壹方的棋只能吃對方的棋，不可吃己方的棋，即不可自相殘殺。<br>	特殊規則：<br>	在中國有些地區，允許可移動的棋子進入山界之中，進入之前，該棋子必須位於山界周圍的鐵路上。在山界中的棋子對方不得攻擊。移出山界的棋子可以放在山界周圍鐵路上的任何空的兵站。也有規則是只允許工兵進入山界。<p>NOTE:The application resources are from internet. Please contact me if there is any problem.</p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.udi.junqi" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a> class="details"> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.kuusoukagaku.android.mahjongfree" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.kuusoukagaku.android.mahjongfree" title="四人麻雀 FREE"> 94.    四人麻雀 FREE  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=KUUSOUKAGAKU+CORP." title="KUUSOUKAGAKU CORP.">KUUSOUKAGAKU CORP.</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.kuusoukagaku.android.mahjongfree"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaLgosEioKJGNvbS5rdXVzb3VrYWdha3UuYW5kcm9pZC5tYWhqb25nZnJlZRABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  ■プレイ制限なしの完全無料でサービス中！<br>ユーザー登録やスマホデータの読み込みは一切ありません。このアプリは、画面上部にスポンサー広告が表示されます。<br>（※広告表示のない有料版もございます）<br>　<br>『四人麻雀 FREE』は、初心者の方でも手軽に遊べる本格的な「四人打ち麻雀」です。<br>　<br>・１０項目以上のローカルルールが設定可能<br>・オープンモードやリトライ機能の導入<br>・対戦相手を３０人から選択可能<br>・およそ２００項目の戦績３１人分が閲覧可能<br>・各戦績項目は全て全員のランキング表示に対応<br>　<br>片手でサクサク遊べるよう「牌を選んで捨てる操作」を工夫しました。牌を中央にドラッグ＆ドロップする感覚で捨てられます（一般的な「選んで捨てる」の２タッチでも操作できます）。<p><br>■ルール説明（★は初期設定）<br>※「新規対局」画面で設定できます。<br>【進行や点数】<br>［設定ルール］<br>・試合長（東風戦／★半荘／一荘）<br>・東東まわし（★オフ／オン）<br>・持ち点（20000～★25000～30000）<br>・トビ終了（★オフ／オン）<br>・延長戦（なし／トップ★30000～35000未満）<br>・アガリ止め（★オフ／オン）<br>・親流れ（なし／不聴／★同東場のみ／流局時毎）<br>［基本ルール］<br>・同時和了は頭ハネ／ウマなし／パオなし</p><p>【ドラや役】<br>［設定ルール］<br>・喰いタン（オフ／★オン）<br>・喰い替え（禁止／現物のみ禁止／★あり）<br>・一発（オフ／★オン）<br>・二翻縛り（★なし／０～１０本場）<br>・裏ドラ（なし／槓裏なし／★槓裏あり）<br>・赤５（★なし／１／２／３／４枚）<br>［基本ルール］<br>・後付あり／暗槓の槍槓はなし<br>・流し満貫なし／十三不塔なし／人和なし<br>・大車輪（小車輪含む）なし／緑一色は發なしも可<br>・九連宝燈は萬子以外も可／八連荘による役満なし<br>・待ちによるダブル役満なし<br>　（国士無双十三面待ち／四暗刻単騎など）<br>・大四喜はシングル役満</p><p>■オプション設定 （★は初期）<br>・卓上点数表示（★なし／あり）<br>・打牌スピード（★遅い／普通／速い）<br>・聴牌ガイド（★なし／あり）<br>・鳴かれた牌表示（★なし／あり）<br>・自模切りマーク（★なし／あり）<br>・オープンモード（★オフ／オン）<br>・背景音（なし／★あり）<br>・効果音（なし／★あり）<br>・音量（小／中／★大）<br>・名前（★あなた）</p><p>■操作説明<br>・局終了後卓中央をタップすると、王牌を全て見ることができます<br>・それ以外をタップすると、自分や対戦相手の伏せた手牌が全て見られます<br>・ほとんどの箇所で画面をタップすると進行をスキップさせることができます</p><p>■対応機種<br>原則、全ての機種に対応しております。</p><p>※Android OS 2.3以上の機種に対応していますが、端末のスペックによっては快適に動作しないことがあります。<br>※アプリ実行中に問題が発生した場合、使用している機種と問題の症状を記載してメールにてご連絡ください。</p><p><br>－－　ご注意事項　－－－－－－－－－－ <br>・初心者の方でもスムースに進行できるようにチョンボはありません<br>・山牌や配牌等、全てランダムで行っております<br>・ＣＯＭが他家の手を見る等の「イカサマ」は、一切行っておりません<br>・戦績は、半荘終了時「戦績更新」を選ばないと更新されません<br>　（トップの場合、「戦績更新」をせず「もう半荘」を選ぶと「連勝」が狙えます）<br>・半荘終了時「戦績更新」を選ぶと連勝記録は途絶えます（連勝やり直し防止の為）<br>　<br>－－　バグ等の修正のご案内　－－－－－<br>■1.3.1（2014/08/29）<br>　・タイトルでBACKキーで終了できるようにしました。<br>　・「ロン（ツモ）」と「ポン」等の間隔を広げました。<br>　・サウンドのボリュームを全体的に小さくしました。<br>　・牌のグラフィックを一部調整しました。<br>　・アイコン画像を各端末の解像度に合わせました。<br>　・広告配信システムをＧｏｏｇｌｅの最新システムに合わせました。<br>　・戦績の「平均順位」等の一部表示を正しくしました。<br>　・特殊な上がり点数が正しくないのを直しました。<br>　・アプリ終了時に必ずプロセスが残っていたのを直しました。<br>■1.2.2（2013/12/20）<br>　・プログラムの安定性を向上させました。<br>　・広告表示内容を調整しました。<br>■1.2.1（2013/12/13）<br>　・COMのバランス調整を行いました。<br>　・配牌のランダム性をより高く修正しました。<br>　・プログラムの安定性を向上させました。<br>■1.1.5 (2013/11/29)<br>　・シャボ待ちで上がれないケースがある症状を修正しました。<br>　・ゲーム再開時にエラー終了するケースがある症状を修正しました。<br>■1.1.4 (2013/11/16)<br>　・プログラムの安定性を向上させました。<br>■1.1.3 (2013/11/11)<br>　・プログラムの安定性を向上させました。<br>　・有料版のご案内を追加しました。<br>■1.1.2 (2013/11/07)<br>　・プログラムの安定性を向上させました。<br>　・タブレットでの起動時表示を綺麗にしました。<br>■1.1.1 (2013/11/06)<br>　・プログラムの安定性を向上させました。<br>　・画面表示を広くし、操作性を向上させました。<br>　・グラフィックのクオリティを向上させました。<br>　・タイトルを『四人麻雀』から『四人麻雀 FREE』に変更しました。<br>■1.0.2 (2013/11/01)<br>　・ゲーム中に稀にエラー終了するケースを修正しました。<br>　・一部機種でスライド時にアプリが再起動される件を修正しました。<br>　・起動時に一部正常に表示されないケースを修正しました。<br>　・ルール設定へのホワイトアウトを調整しました。<br>■1.0.1 (2013/10/30)<br>　・対戦相手選択で、正常に選べないケースの不具合を修正しました。<br>■1.0.0 (2013/10/28)<br>　・配信を開始しました。<br>　<br>＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝</p><p>企画・開発・販売：　空想科学株式会社</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span 個棋子在垂直方向、水平方向或對角線方向連成一條直線即可。看似簡單，但走錯一步，可能導致全盤皆輸。提防狡猾的電腦 - 它可能在您不經意間將您擊敗。</p><p>遊戲特色:<br>*在同一裝置上與電腦或其他玩家進行對戰。<br>*尤其是專家級的高品質人工智能引擎。<br>*支援備用棋盤和棋子。	<br>* 撤銷和重複全部棋步。<br>* 顯示上一棋步。.<br>* href="/store/apps/details?id=com.yuanwei.resistance" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.yuanwei.resistance" title="桌遊助手：抵抗組織"> 104.    桌遊助手：抵抗組織  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Yuanwei+Chen" title="Yuanwei Chen">Yuanwei Chen</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.yuanwei.resistance"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIAoeEhwKFmNvbS55dWFud2VpLnJlc2lzdGFuY2UQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  這個遊戲是桌面遊戲《抵抗組織》(Don Eskridge's Resistance)的第三方移動版，可允許玩家在沒有實體紙牌時進行遊戲。5至10人可以共用一臺平板或者手機進行遊戲，推薦人數為6人（平衡性最佳）。7-10人也有很好的娛樂性。<p>抵抗組織是一款在2009年在網上發表的小品聚會遊戲，在得到市場熱烈響應後推出實體版。該遊戲屬於殺手遊戲類型，但顯著的改進是在遊戲進行中無人離場，從而避免了殺人遊戲中過早離場的玩家的無聊感。</p><p>抵抗組織在遊戲性上具有相當的優勢，但由於需要卡牌支持以及故事性的原因，在華語圈一直不是特別流行（與三國殺，狼人殺，誰是臥底這類小品級別遊戲相比）因此本人制作一個便於攜帶的移動版，以擴大其影響。</p><p>目前這個遊戲只能實現原作的基本版，後續功能還在加入中。</p><p>有任何意見與想法，請不吝賜教。</p><p></p><p></p><p></p> Okey  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Ahoy+Games" title="Ahoy Games">Ahoy Games</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.ahoygames.okey"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHAoaEhgKEmNvbS5haG95Z2FtZXMub2tleRABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Okey is a traditional tile-based game with long history and many variations. It's highly popular in Turkey among Turkish people, played mainly in coffee houses by people in every age. It's very similar to Rummy/Rummikub as it is played with the same set of boards and tiles but with different rules.<p>Realistic feeling, simple interface and exciting gameplay!</p><p>Okey Game is played by four players with a set of 106 tiles and 104 of them are numbered from 1 to 13 with four different colors. During the game each player has 14 tiles on his board. On each turn a player draws one tile and discards one tile. The object of the game is to be first to form a board which consists sets and runs using all 14 tiles. There are special tiles chosen in every game, called jokers which helps the player form his 14 tiles board of sets and runs, by replacing the tile which is missing. Two last tiles from 106-tile-set represented with stars are tricky 'false jokers', which against expectations acts as normal numbered tile.</p><p>Features:<br>* Advanced Artificial Intelligence<br>* Full HD graphics (perfect for high resolution tablets)<br>* Multitouch support<br>* Unlimited hours of joy<br>* Multiple game modes<br>* High playability<br>* High quality animations</p><p>In Okey game, when you attempt to win a game by discarding a tile to the center of table (bank), if there are any mistakes with your groups, these groups will be highlighted with red color.<br>You can tap and hold a tile in the same place for 3 seconds to flip it. This is generally used as a reminder of joker tiles in Okey game.</p><p>For online version please try our new game "Okey Pro" !</p><p>--------------------------------</p><p>Türk insanının en çok sevdiği okey oyununun teknolojiyle en güzel birleşimi. Evde, yolda, bayırda, çayırda istediğiniz zaman oynayın.</p><p>Bu Okey oyunu online değildir. Bu Okey oyununda gelişmiş yapay zekaya karşı oynuyorsunuz. class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=de.saschahlusiak.freebloks" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=de.saschahlusiak.freebloks" title="Freebloks 3D"> 109.    Freebloks 3D  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Sascha+Hlusiak" title="Sascha Hlusiak">Sascha Hlusiak</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="de.saschahlusiak.freebloks"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaJAoiEiAKGmRlLnNhc2NoYWhsdXNpYWsuZnJlZWJsb2tzEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  This is the Android version of Freebloks 3D, an implementation of the famous board game Blokus. Try to place as many tiles on the board as possible, keeping in mind only two simple rules: your tiles must touch a corner of one of your previously placed tiles, but they must not share an edge. Can you play more tiles than your opponents? <p>RULES<br>Each player has 21 Tetris-like tiles: 12 tiles with 5 squares, 5 tiles with 4 squares, 2 tiles with 3 squares, 1 tile with 2 squares and 1 tile with 1 square. <br>Players take turns in placing one tile onto the 20x20 board. The first tile for each player has to be placed in their corner of the board. Each following tile has to touch a corner of one of your previous tiles, but it must never share an edge. It may share edges with the opponents' tiles though. <br>If a player has no more possible move, they have to pass. The game is over when no player can place a tile. <br>For each player, the squares of all their tiles on the board are added up. Finishing a game with all stones placed on the board gives a 15 points bonus. If the monomino is placed last, you will get a 20 points bonus. The player with the most points  wins. </p><p>HOW TO PLAY<br>- Swipe the list of available tiles with your finger. <br>- Select and drag a tile onto the board. <br>- Rotate the stone using one of the 4 handles. <br>- To flip a stone, slide your finger from one handle toward the opposing handle.<br>- Place the tile in the desired position. The tile will appear green if the position is valid, and red otherwise. Possible corners are highlighted on the board for convenience. <br>- Tap the tile in a valid position to place it. <br>- You can rotate the board at any time to see the opponents' tiles. </p><p>Quit the app at any time, your current game will be saved and restored on next start. </p><p>FEATURES<br>- Supports 2-player modes, with 2 colors (Original and Blokus Duo), 4 colors (2 each).<br>- Customizable board sizes other than 20x20.<br>- Play against the computer or humans on the same device. <br>- Play online against your friends<br>- Hint and undo options<br>- Leaderboards and Achievements (Google+ login required)<br>- Looks great on tablets, too!</p><p>The game is network-compatible with Freebloks 3D for Windows and Linux: http://www.saschahlusiak.de/freebloks-3d/ </p><p>PLEASE DONATE<br>Freebloks 3D is absolutely free, open source and without advertisement! EVER! But things for free still have a value. If you would like to pay for Freebloks, please consider buying Freebloks VIP:<br>https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=de.saschahlusiak.freebloksvip</p><p>The complete source code is available on GitHub: https://github.com/shlusiak/Freebloks-Android </p><p>If you have any idea, feature request or wish concerning the game, just drop us an email: apps@saschahlusiak.de </p><p>TRANSLATIONS: if you would like to contribute and translate Freebloks into your language, please send me an email. :-)</p><p>Similar: Blokish and Blokr!</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=de.saschahlusiak.freebloks" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  </div> </div>     <div class="reason-set">  <span class="stars-container"> <a href="/store/apps/details?id=de.saschahlusiak.freebloks" tabindex="-1"> <div class="reason-set-star-rating">  <div class="tiny-star star-rating-non-editable-container" aria-label="獲評為 4.2 顆星 (總分 5 顆星)"> <div class="current-rating" style="width: 83.5716724395752%;"></div> in a Row  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Benjamin+Lochmann+New+Media+GmbH" title="Benjamin Lochmann New Media GmbH">Benjamin Lochmann New Media GmbH</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" class="description">  The popular all-time classic “4 in a Row” in the to-go edition as a free app for your smart phone. Play against your friends, beat the computer or look for opponents from around the world to see who has the better tactics or strategy to win the game. In “4 in a Row” the players take turns dropping colored discs into a grid. The aim of the game is to connect a row of four of one’s own colour, either vertically, horizontally or diagonally. <p>~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~<br>Play against the computer:<br>~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~<br>With the local single-player mode you can improve your “4 in a Row” skills. Play against the computer, who tries to figure out your tactics and strategy in three levels of difficulty.</p><p>~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~<br>Local game against friends:<br>~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~<br>Play “4 in a Row” on one device against your friend. Similar rules of the game as in the local single-player mode. However you don’t play against the computer, but against each other on only one device and take turns dropping the discs to get four discs in one row. The better tactics and strategy will show who is better and lead to a win!</p><p>~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~<br>Play against international users:<br>~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~<br>Look for “4 in a Row” opponents worldwide. The all-time classic “4 in a Row” is available internationally and you can play online against gamers from around the world. A flag shows you where your opponent comes from. As soon as your opponent has installed the free app, the games can begin. </p><p>~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~<br>Further details:<br>~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~<br>- If you win against your online opponent in the online multiplayer mode, the corresponding points will be credited to your account.<br>- If you win against a very skilled “4 in a Row” opponent in the online multiplayer mode, you will receive more points for your win and will be credited to your account.<br>- The more points you gain whilst playing “4 in a Row”, the higher you will rise in the ranking list.<br>- Create your online friends list to invite your friends at any time to a match of “4 in a Row” for free.<br>-  Talk to your opponents worldwide with the integrated chat function.<br>- The all-time classic “4 in a Row” is available worldwide as a free app. You can therefore play online against international opponents. How good are your tactics, are you better at logical reasoning than your opponent? Will you be first in connecting a row?</p><p>We hope you like our free “4 in a Row” app! We would appreciate feedback (even if it’s critical) on our international online strategy game for free. Simply send us a mail to the noted support address. Enjoy and don’t forget four in a row!</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.lochmann.fourinarow" <br>将棋ウォーズ【日本将棋連盟公認】は、従来の将棋アプリの常識を覆す派手な演出、グラフィックとAIを駆使し、超初心者から上級者まですぐに適切な相手が見つかる充実のオンライン対局を提供するサービスです。 <br>10分切れ負けや3分切れ負けや10秒将棋でスピーディーに対局できます。 <br>オフラインでコンピュータと対局もできます。<br>将棋ウォーズの段級位で、日本将棋連盟公認の免状・認定状（六段～５級）申請できます。<br> <br>初代名人大橋宗桂が江戸幕府から俸禄(現在の給与)を支給された慶長17年(1612年)からちょうど400年という節目に伴う、将棋名人400年祭記念のアプリです。 <br> <br>プロ棋士にはじめて勝利した将棋ソフトponanzaによる棋神降臨(5手代指し)を使うことにより、強いライバルに勝つことも可能。 <br>また、使った囲いや戦法など、羽生善治永世名人をはじめとした棋士カードコレクションも200種類以上を搭載しています。 <br>twitter連携の観戦機能も充実しており、ユーザー間でコメントし合うことも可能です。 世界上150多个国家约8万名会员利用的网络围棋对局网站、世界最大级别的网络围棋沙龙——“熊猫围棋网”的安卓版免费应用程序开始运营了！您不妨尝试通过“熊猫围棋网”，在自己家中或外出地，体验一下在世界范围内不断扩大普及的“围棋”智力游戏。<p>《应用功能介绍》</p><p>【对局•观战】<br>显示目前进入对局室的用户一览，可申请对局或实时观战。通常1,000人以上同时连接，24小时365天，不论何时何地均可随时开始围棋游戏或观战。请利用上班或上学时的短暂休闲时间享受围棋乐趣。此外，网站使用了已获得专利的安全可靠的评级系统，不论棋力如何，均可通过公正的比赛与合适的对手进行对局。<br>--------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br>【棋谱鉴赏】<br>以棋圣战、名人战、本因坊战、王座战、围棋圣战、十段战等锦标赛为代表，可观看顶级棋手的对局直播，也可观看存档棋谱。<br>此外，还有各种职业棋手对局、“职业围棋混双赛”的对局以及业余围棋赛等直播比赛，存档棋谱也非常充实。<br>--------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br>【新闻•直播】<br>围棋作为智力游戏之一，在世界范围内不断扩大普及。<br>熊猫围棋网登载有关围棋的各种热点信息。<br>此外，还登载职业围棋锦标赛及业余围棋赛的直播信息。<br>--------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br>【申请对局】<br>点击画面下方的“申请对局”，便会显示可以对局的玩家一览，可向希望对局的对手提出对局申请。此外，若选择了“自动搜寻对局对手”，电脑会自动搜寻符合自己希望条件的对手进行匹配。可通过“收件箱”确认对手的申请，也可通过“发件箱”确认自己的申请内容。<br>--------------------------------------------------------------------------------【女棋手咨询室】<br>目前活跃在棋坛上的12名女性职业棋手，每月轮流通过照片与书信介绍她们的近况。<br>还回答大家提出的各种问题。<br>--------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br>【每日一问】<br>每天提出各种类型的问题。<br>每日更新一个问题，您可利用很少的空闲时间轻松作答。<br>“坚持就是胜利”，通过每天坚持回答问题，一定会提高您的棋力。<br>--------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br>【网上交流广场】<br>・熊猫围棋网提供“交流广场”（SNS）服务。<br>在“交流广场”可享受如下服务。</p><p>・可浏览自己的对局履历与棋谱。<br>・可参加感兴趣的社区，还可通过登录公告板及发送消息等与其他社区成员交流。<br>--------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br>【存档】<br>可将自己对局的棋谱全部保存到软件内。可自己输入棋谱进行保存，还可以输入变化图等，不论何时何地都能展开对局讨论。<br>--------------------------------------------------------------------------------【设置】<br>可进行以下各种设置。此外还可确认本应用程序的操作方法。</p><p>《有关对局之外的内容》<br>・设置用户ID<br>・状态变更<br>・设置信息<br>・对局室的移动<br>《有关对局的内容》<br>・设置显示坐标<br>・自动位置播放速度的变更<br>・有无开始位置的确认<br>・游戏开始后有无缩小窗口<br>・调节音量<br>※平板电脑版还可对棋子及棋盘等布局进行自定义。</p><p>--------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br>《熊猫围棋网的活动及大赛介绍》<br>熊猫围棋网举办各种围棋大赛及活动。</p><p>①国际体育大会 熊猫围棋网杯在线围棋锦标赛<br>这是合并“国际体育大会 围棋在线锦标赛”与“熊猫围棋网杯 世界网络业余围棋大赛”之后诞生的大型世界网络围棋大赛。<br>按照棋力分类，举办从无差别～C级别的比赛，各级别获奖人员将获得精美的奖品。免费参加，这是一个可与全世界围棋爱好者对局的独一无二的大赛，请大家踊跃参加。</p><p>②“马拉松围棋大赛”<br>暑假例行活动！让我们在42.195天内对战300局吧<br>完成选手可获得25世本因坊治勋的奖状。</p><p>③中日友好大学团体对抗赛<br>由代表日本与中国大学的围棋成员举行5人1组的团体交流赛。<br>为了促进中日友好交流，熊猫围棋网全力以赴赞助本活动。<br>此外，在交流赛当天，通过熊猫围棋网直播主将赛的实况，欢迎大家观看中日大学生的围棋激战。</p><p>（此外还有很多其他丰富的活动。详情请浏览主页。）<br>--------------------------------------------------------------------------------</p><p>《关于用户技术支持》<br>当“不了解操作方法”或“对局中出现纠纷”时，完善的技术支持体制将为每一位用户提供放心的服务。</p><p>・熊猫围棋网实施对违反礼仪行为的管理，努力提供注重礼仪的舒适对局环境。<br>・网站汇集了“怎么处理？”及“不了解处理方法”等诸多“常见问题”。为您介绍遇到麻烦时的有用信息。</p><p>--------</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> href="/store/apps/details?id=com.ansangha.drcheckers" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.ansangha.drcheckers" title="西洋跳棋"> 146.    西洋跳棋  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=SUD+Inc." title="SUD Inc.">SUD Inc.</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.ansangha.drcheckers"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIQofEh0KF2NvbS5hbnNhbmdoYS5kcmNoZWNrZXJzEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  西洋跳棋是一種兩人棋盤遊戲。玩家的棋子都是沿斜角走的。棋子可跳過敵方的棋子並吃掉它。<p>遊戲在和兩色相間的棋盤進行，但事實上只用到棋盤一半的格子。兩方各在棋盤的一邊，將首2或3行的深色格子放滿己方的棋子。</p><p>雙方輪流行走。「未成王」的棋子只能向左上角或右上角且無人佔據的格子斜走一格。吃子時，敵方的棋子必須是在己方棋子的左上角或右上角的格子，而且該敵方棋子的對應的左上角或右上角必須沒有棋子。</p><p>當棋子到底線停下時，它就「成王」，以後可以向後移動。（在某些規則下，成王的棋子更可以吃右上角和左下角的棋子，以及像國際象棋中的「象」一樣，格數不限的走。這個規則稱為flying king。）</p><p>若一枚棋子可以吃棋，它必須吃。棋子可以連吃。即是說，若一枚棋子吃過敵方的棋子後，若它新的位置亦可以吃敵方的另一些敵方棋子，它必須再吃，直到無法再吃為止。</p><p>若一位玩家沒法行走或所有棋子均被吃去便算輸。</p><p>8×8的棋盤，每方12枚棋子。非成王的棋子只能往前斜跳吃，成王棋才可往後前跳吃。沒flying king。可吃棋的棋子不必須選擇吃得最多棋子的路徑。</p><p>SUD Inc.</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.ansangha.drcheckers" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  </div> </div>     <div class="reason-set">  <span class="stars-container"> <a class="description">  開心像棋是一款人氣火爆、玩法刺激的網絡棋牌遊戲，無需註冊、無需充值，安裝後即可立即開始遊戲。　　<br>★★★遊戲特色★★★　　<br>1. 和成千上萬的真實玩家，在網絡上合作對戰，盡享遊戲樂趣；　　<br>2. 支持遊客登錄和正式賬號註冊，遊戲完全免費下載和使用，每日登錄自動獲取獎勵金幣， 破產即可獲得救濟金， 動物記憶遊戲是為兒童設計的，適合所有年齡層，寶寶、學齡前幼兒、學齡兒童至青少年都可以玩。 男孩、女孩都愛。<p><br>玩法 為孩子們的動物記憶遊戲:<br>一開始您會看到所有紙牌都已經蓋上， 請觸碰其中一張紙牌，並牢記紙牌圖案。 下次觸碰紙牌時要試著找出和上一張牌圖案相同的牌。 如果兩張牌的圖案相同，紙牌就不會翻回蓋上，您可以繼續找下一組圖案。 如果不一樣，兩張紙牌就會蓋回去，您可以再試一次。 五子棋是一种两人对弈的纯策略型棋类游戏，棋具与围棋通用，是起源于中国古代的传统黑白棋种之一。发展于日本，流行于欧美。容易上手，老少皆宜，而且趣味横生，引人入胜；不仅能增强思维能力，提高智力，而且富含哲理，有助于修身养性。<br>传统五子棋的棋具与围棋相同，棋子放置于棋盘线交叉点上。两人对局，各执一色，轮流下一子，先将横、竖或斜线的5个或5个以上同色棋子连成不间断的一排者为胜。 <span - 没有其他的片上面躺着或部分覆盖它<br> - 没有其他的片躺在向左或它的右边</p><p>麻将特点：</p><p> -  Wi  -  Fi的较量你的朋友！<br> - 令人惊叹的设计<br> - 流畅的游戏机制<br> - “保存游戏”选项<br> - 两种语言界面<br> - 酷音乐和声音<br> - 伟大的TOP 10<br> - 放大，使麻将牌做大<br> - 比分＆奖金</p><p>修正：<br> -  BlueStacks支持添加<br> - 位置请求被取消<br> - <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.rwhz.dzds"> <div class="pon"   </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  手遊棋牌界突破性創新，匯智遊戲《德州大師》首創德州撲克三張牌玩法，既可以領略德克薩斯的魅力，又可以體驗中國民間娛樂精髓，比三張牌更刺激，比德州更easy！拒絕前戲，直接高潮！給妳全新的博弈享受！遊戲匯集各地的棋牌佼佼者，讓妳的每壹次全押都更顯魄力與豪爽！德州大師中瞬息萬變的牌局，將帶給妳前所未有的刺激體驗！<br>經典德州規則：<p>發牌壹般分為5個步驟，分別為：<br>1、Perflop—先下大小盲註，然後給每個玩家發2張底牌，大盲註後面第壹個玩家選擇跟註、加註或者蓋牌放棄，按照順時針方向，其他玩家依次表態，大盲註玩家最後表態，如果玩家有加註情況，前面已經跟註的玩家需要再次表態甚至多次表態。<br>2、Flop—同時發三張公牌，由小盲註開始（如果小盲註已蓋牌，由後面最近的玩家開始，以此類推），按照順時針方向依次表態，玩家可以選擇下註、加註、或者蓋牌放棄。<br>3、Turn—發第4張牌，由小盲註開始，按照順時針方向依次表態。<br>4、River—發第五張牌，由小盲註開始，按照順時針方向依次表態，玩家可以選擇下註、加註、或者蓋牌放棄。<br>5、比牌—經過前面4輪發牌和下註，剩余的玩家開始亮牌比大小，成牌最大的玩家贏取池底。<br>6、比牌方法：<br>用自己的2張底牌和5張公共牌結合在壹起，選出5張牌，不論手中的牌使用幾張（甚至可以不用手中的底牌），湊成最大的成牌，跟其他玩家比大小。<br>比牌先比牌型，大的牌型大於小的牌型，牌型壹般分為10種，從大到小為：<br>同花大順＞同花順＞4條＞葫蘆＞同花＞順子＞三條＞二對＞壹對＞高牌</p><p>全押場規則：</p><p>全押場玩法通俗易懂，用自己的2張底牌和5張公共牌結合在壹起，選出5張牌，不論手中的牌使用幾張（甚至可以不用手中的底牌），湊成最大的成 牌，跟其他玩家比大小。 <br>1、玩家獲得兩張底牌（暗牌），可下註、加註、和看牌操作，看牌後下註或加註金額為不看牌的兩倍 <br>2、玩家獲得底牌後，遊戲分兩次發五張公牌（3+2），底牌加公牌組成最大的壹手五張牌來決定勝負 <br>3、牌型大小：皇家同花順&gt;同花順&gt;四條&gt;葫蘆&gt;同花&gt;順子&gt;三條&gt;兩對&gt;壹對&gt;高牌 <br>4、下註3輪後，可指定玩家比牌操作，只剩壹個對手時可全押操作。 <br>5、比牌先比牌型，大的牌型大於小的牌型，牌型壹般分為10種，從大到小為：同花大順＞同花順＞4條＞葫蘆＞同花＞順子＞三條＞二對＞壹對＞高牌</p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" Like Mahjong, this is a game that is played in social groups in coffee houses and bars. Historically variants of this game are believed to have originated in Egypt over 3000 years ago, but was picked up by the Romans and then later to India. It also spread to east Asia, but was then largely replaced by Xiangqi (Chinese chess). It is now very popular in the west.</p><p>Features:<br>-- Strong Backgammon AI<br>-- 5 Difficulty levels<br>-- Full match play + doubling cube<br>-- 3 Boards and piece sets<br>-- Hints, 2 player hotseat and stats<br>-- Supports touch screen/trackerball<br>-- Designed for both Tablet and Phone</p><p>This free version is supported by 3rd party ads. class="description">  數字推盤遊戲（n-puzzle）是一種最早的滑塊類遊戲，常見的類型有十五數字推盤遊戲和八數字推盤遊戲等。<p>八數字推盤（又名重排九宮）則同樣是Noyes Palmer Chapman在1870年代發明並且馬丁·加德納在科學人尋求更快的解答。也有人宣稱重排九宮是傳統中國遊戲，來自洛書，並且為華容道的祖先</p><p>數字推盤遊戲是由一塊有凹槽的板和寫有數字的方塊所組成。</p><p>十五數字推盤遊戲的板上會有十五個方塊和一個大小相當於一個方塊的空位（供方塊移動之用）。</p><p>遊戲者要移動板上的方塊，讓所有的方塊順著數字的次序排列。</p><p></p><p></p><p></p> Corners - Checkers  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Miroslav+Kisly" title="Miroslav Kisly">Miroslav Kisly</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="mkisly.corners"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaGAoWEhQKDm1raXNseS5jb3JuZXJzEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  The most downloadable Corners game in the Android market!!!<br>Ugolki, also known as Corners or Уголки in Russia, is a two-player board game that is typically played on an 8×8 checkers/chess board. It is said to have been invented in Europe in the late 18th century. <br>This game requires less thinking than traditional checkers, but can also be very challenging at the highest difficulty level and can train your brain perfectly.<br>The application contains powerful algorithm of game and friendly classic wooden graphic interface. <p>Features:<br>* On-line<br>* One or Two player<br>* Statistics<br>* Classic wooden and simple interface<br>* Auto-save<br>* Undo move</p><p>Game rules:<br>Pieces can move in all directions horizontally and vertically. During one turn you can move the piece or jump over other pieces multiple times. It is not required to perform all jumps. The goal of the game is to move all your pieces to the opponent's side. The player, who is the first to place all his pieces on the opponent's side, wins the game.</p><p>Your comments will help to improve this application in the future.</p><p></p><p></p> <span Pup Rummy Lite  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=YPR+Software+B.V." title="YPR Software B.V.">YPR Software B.V.</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="air.com.yprgames.cubrummi.lite"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKAomEiQKHmFpci5jb20ueXByZ2FtZXMuY3VicnVtbWkubGl0ZRABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  The free brain game with numbered tiles.<p>Play the addictive game of Tile Rummi (aka Rummy Tiles). <br>Play your tiles in matching groups of three or more. You can use jokers as wildcard tiles. <br>Re-arrange tiles already on the table to create new possibilities. <br>If you are the first to have played all your tiles, you win the game. </p><p>This is a popular game, played all around the world in many variations. <br>Pup Rummy Lite offers three variations of the game.</p><p>With Pup Rummy Lite, you can: <br>- play 3 different built-in game types <br>- play against one computer player<br>- play with or without a 60-second time limit per turn<br>- choose your opponents out of three different players with individual playing strategies <br>- select your playing level: easy, medium or hard <br>- have the playing level automatically adapt to your playing strength <br>- undo and redo all moves in your turn <br>- ask for a hint when you're stuck <br>- pause the game at any moment <br>- stop at any time and continue later <br>- zoom in for bigger tiles or zoom out for more space <br>- speed up or slow down the tile movement <br>- play using one of the two included tile sets <br>- pick one of the included game backgrounds</p><p>You play by simply dragging your tiles around. Or you can tap matching tiles first to select them, and drag them all in one go. Opponent moves are animated so you don't lose track. </p><p>Follow us on Facebook for news and tips:<br>https://www.facebook.com/pages/YPRgames/281997972000743</p><p>Download Pup Rummi Lite now for href="/store/apps/details?id=jp.co.ultimaarchitect.android.reversi.free" title="Ultima Reversi"> 237.    Ultima Reversi  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Ultima+Architect+Inc." title="Ultima Architect Inc.">Ultima Architect Inc.</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="jp.co.ultimaarchitect.android.reversi.free"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaNAoyEjAKKmpwLmNvLnVsdGltYWFyY2hpdGVjdC5hbmRyb2lkLnJldmVyc2kuZnJlZRABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  OVER 2.8 MILLION DOWNLOADS!!!<br>Reversi (also known as Othello) is a very challenging board game for all ages. The rules of Reversi are much simpler than any other board games. However, easy to learn doesn't mean easy to play well. It offers so many strategic possibilities, that you can spend the rest of your life to master it.<p>Ultima Reversi is an implementation of Reversi, having many great features to customize the game and make it more interesting. Challenge your strategic skills with Ultima Reversi!</p><p><br>===== FEATURES =====<br>* 1-player mode (Human vs CPU)<br>* 2-players mode (Human vs Human).<br>* Watching mode (CPU vs CPU).<br>* 10 levels of difficulty.<br>* Scoreboard and rating system.<br>* Various board size (4x4, 5x5, 6x6, 7x7, 8x8) and various board color.<br>* Various rules (normal mode, 4 stage handicap modes and 2 variant modes).<br>* Other various options (CPU Level Auto-maching, Alternate first move, etc.)<br>* Support tablet size devices. You can enjoy with your family or friends in a tablet!</p><p><br>===== REVERSI RULES =====<br>* The game begins with each player having two discs on a board.<br>* The players alternate turns, each adding an additional disc on the board.<br>* A valid move must capture at least one of the opponent's discs. This is done by surrounding it, either vertically, horizontally, or diagonally (or a combination of all three). When this occurs, the opponent's discs that you have surround become yours.<br>* If one player cannot make a valid move, the player must pass and the other player plays again.<br>* The game is over when the entire board is filled or when no side can make a valid move.<br>* The winner of the game is the one with the most discs when the game is over.</p><p>NOTES: Ultima Reversi has an "Auto Pass" feature that automatically passes your turn if you have no other move available and must pass.</p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.rottzgames.logic" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.rottzgames.logic" title="Real Einstein's Riddle"> 242.    Real Einstein's Riddle  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Rottz+Games" title="Rottz Games">Rottz Games</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.rottzgames.logic"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHgocEhoKFGNvbS5yb3R0emdhbWVzLmxvZ2ljEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Real Einstein Challenge is a logic puzzle to challenge your brain. It is known as different names, such as Einsteins Riddle, Zebra Puzzle or Sherlock Holmes Puzzle.<p><br>FEBRUARY/MARCH 2015 UPDATE: Complete redesign of the game, 5 new variables, hundreds of new boards and a new difficulty level: INSANE! Now with updated icons, hope you all enjoy!</p><p><br>How to Play video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w62vqmvUSIw</p><p><br>The game presents a logic problem that gives you several clues describing a scenario involving a number of people. Each person has a certain job, owns a certain pet, likes some kind of sport, among other attributes. Your role in this brain teaser is a mix of detective with intelligence work: by using pure logic thinking and elimination, to uniquely deduce the whole scenario based on only a few initial clues.</p><p><br>Features:<br>• Hundreds of Riddles: 580 logic riddles, all free! No packs to buy or anything.<br>• Increasing Difficulty: Several grid sizes, from 4x4 to 12x9 - the bigger the harder.<br>• Filters for Experts: Filters to help you find hints related to the elements and variables you want.<br>• Mobile: Fully adapted to mobile interface: no clumsy triangular grid as the paper version.<br>• Auto-Save: game is automatically saved so you can continue later.</p><p><br>Clues follow these lines:<br>"The English wears the Sherlock Cap. The American likes Wine. The one that owns a Fox doesn't drink Beer..."</p><p><br>And your job in the Einstein Riddle is to fully determine the scenario using logical assumptions, such as knowing what drink the English likes, and what kind of hat the guy who owns a Fox wears.</p><p><br>Real Einsteins challenge is new, from the makers of Real Kakuro, Real Sudoku, Real Nonogram, Real Jigsaw and Real Mastermind. If you like pure logic problems, this game is for you: a true enigma game.</p><p><br>If you have any suggestions or problems let us know through einstein.and@rottzgames.com or the Facebook group: href="/store/apps/details?id=jp.co.dreamonline.shogionline" title="将棋オンライン"> 245.    将棋オンライン  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=DreamOnline,inc." title="DreamOnline,inc.">DreamOnline,inc.</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="jp.co.dreamonline.shogionline"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaJwolEiMKHWpwLmNvLmRyZWFtb25saW5lLnNob2dpb25saW5lEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  オンライン対戦が、『無料で好きなだけできる』将棋アプリです。<br>面倒な登録もなく、ニックネームだけですぐに始められます。<br>さらに、サロン内に参戦しているGPS将棋(コンピュータ)とも常時対局可能です。<p>インターネットに繋がる環境であれば、いつでもネット上の他のプレイヤーと対局/観戦ができます。<br>世界中の棋士たちとのオンライン対局をお楽しみください。</p><p><br>【利用料金】<br>完全無料</p><p>【主な機能】<br>◆ネットワーク対戦<br>ネットワークプレイヤーとの対局/観戦が可能。<br>勝ち負けによるレーティング制の他、同じクラスとの対戦に勝ち越すことで昇級していくF～Sまでのクラス分け(順位戦)があります。</p><p>◆チャット機能<br>ユーザー同士でチャットを行うことができます。<br>対局後に感想戦を行うことも可能です。</p><p>◆『GPS将棋』と対局可能<br>ネットワークサロン内に世界コンピュータ将棋選手権優勝(2009年,2012年)のGPS将棋が参戦中!<br>GPS将棋に勝利することで、Webサイトに棋譜が掲載されます。</p><p>[将棋オンライン - 今日のGPS将棋]<br>http://shogionline.jp/gpsToday.html</p><p>※GPS将棋はGPLライセンスによって配布されているもので、ドリームオンラインの責任の基に、改変を行っていないGPS将棋プログラムを実行しています。</p><p>◆棋譜再生<br>自分が対局した棋譜データは自動で保存され、鑑賞することが可能です。<br>また、他のプレイヤーの棋譜については、Webサイトで参照することが可能です。</p><p>[将棋オンライン - 過去の棋譜]<br>http://shogionline.jp/gameHistory.html</p><p><br>【特徴】<br>◆パソコンやiOSとも連携<br>将棋オンラインは様々な環境から参戦できるため、多くのプレイヤーが参加しています。</p><p>iOSアプリ『i将棋サロン』との連携<br>iOSアプリのネットワーク対応将棋アプリ『i将棋サロン』ユーザーとの対局/チャットが可能です。</p><p>◆会員登録について<br>将棋オンラインをご利用いただくには、ニックネームだけで始める"かんたんログイン機能"が便利です。</p><p>ただ、Androidのユーザーでパソコンでプレイする場合や、機種変更後に戦績を引き継ぎたい場合は、会員登録が必要になります。<br>メールアドレスとパスワードだけの簡単な登録で、もちろん無料でご利用頂けます。</p><p>会員登録後は以下のアプリから同じユーザー情報でお楽しみいただけます。<br>・無料Webサービス。『将棋オンライン』 <br>  http://shogionline.jp/<br>・Windows Storeアプリ『将棋オンライン』<br>・iOSアプリ『i将棋サロン』</p><p><br>【お客様へお願いとご注意】<br>お問い合わせの際には、以下の内容を記載していただくようお願いいたします。未記入の場合は、適切な返信を行えない場合がございます。<br>・使用している機種名<br>・使用している携帯電話のキャリア名(キャリア契約を行なっている場合)<br>・使用している通信環境(Wi-fi,3G,LTE等)<br>・将棋オンラインで使用しているユーザー名<br>・将棋オンラインのバージョン</p><p>下記に該当するお問い合わせにつきましては、個別での返信を行わない場合がございますので、あらかじめご了承ください。<br>・不正、迷惑行為のご報告<br>・ご意見、ご要望</p><p>また、ご質問の前にFAQを一度ご確認頂き、同様の質問がないかご確認をお願いいたします。</p><p>[将棋オンライン <div class="description">  現在我們的西洋跳棋遊戲有精美的高清畫面設計了。西洋跳棋2，也被稱為國際跳棋，可以讓你和好朋友一起玩，也可以和手機對戰。當和手機機器人對戰時，你可以通過和不同級別的人工智能機器人切磋以了解你的水平。<p>西洋跳棋是一個簡單但有挑戰的考驗玩家策略的棋牌遊戲。它由兩人在6x6，8x8或是10x10的棋牌上玩。有了這個安卓版本，你就可以把這個經典遊戲隨身攜帶了。<br>一方執深色子，一方執淺色子。雙方交替移動棋子。玩家依對角線從一個方格移動到另一個方格。當一方的棋子越過對方的棋子，則可將對方的棋子從棋盤移除。默認情況下，要被移除的棋子需要從棋盤拿走，但是你可以定制規則以取消這個規則。<br>遊戲的目標就是把對手的棋子全部吃掉。</p><p>西洋跳棋2 是一個免費遊戲，包含很多功能：<br>* 精美高清畫質<br>* 很多種棋盤設計供選擇<br>* 支持國際規則和美國規則<br>* 高級的 Magma Mobile 人工智能引擎<br>* 撤銷功能<br>* 保存功能<br>* 可以自定規則<br>* 為平板電腦優化過</p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a Cool Lines  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=AZS+Software" title="AZS Software">AZS Software</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.azssoftware.coollines"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIwohEh8KGWNvbS5henNzb2Z0d2FyZS5jb29sbGluZXMQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  避免形成五個或更多的球的顏色相同，在這種上癮的免費遊戲線填充板！嘗試獲得最高分與組合的獎金！自定義遊戲的許多包括背景！ ，你也可以用圖形來代替彩球玩！ <p>怎麼玩： <br>- 該遊戲的目標是通過形成五個或更多的球顏色相同的水平，垂直或對角線移除球。 <br>- 您可以將一個球的地方，特別是如果有之間的球的當前位置和所需的目的地空單元格的路徑。 <br>- 如果你形成一條線，你獲得一個回合。如果沒有，三個新的球被添加。 <br>- 該得分提高取決於每行取出球的數量。 <br>- 建立在連續轉彎幾行來獲得組合的獎金。 <br>- 比賽結束時，董事會已滿。 <br>- 色盲的人，可以到選項菜單與形狀，而不是彩色球玩。</p><p><br>----------</p><p><br>Avoid filling the board by forming lines of five or more balls of the same color in this addictive free game! Try to get the highest score with combo bonus! Customize the game with the many included backgrounds! And you can also play with shapes instead of colored balls!</p><p>HOW TO PLAY<br>- The goal of the game is to remove balls by forming horizontal, vertical or diagonal lines of five or more balls of the same color.<br>- You can move a ball to a particular place if there is a path of empty cells between the current position of the ball and the desired destination.<br>- If you form a line, you gain one turn. If not, three new balls are added.<br>- The score increases depending on the number of balls removed per line.<br>- Build several lines in consecutive turns to get combo bonus.<br>- The game ends when the board is full.<br>- Color blind people can go to the options menu to play with shapes instead of colored balls.</p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a Real Hitori  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Luiz+Deucher" title="Luiz Deucher">Luiz Deucher</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.deucher.realhitorifree"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaJAoiEiAKGmNvbS5kZXVjaGVyLnJlYWxoaXRvcmlmcmVlEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  If you enjoy Sudoku you will love Hitori. Unlike Sudoku, all numbers are given in the grid. The objective is to eliminate numbers by filling in the squares such that remaining cells do not contain numbers that appear more than once in either a given row or column.<p>Filled-in cells cannot be horizontally or vertically adjacent, although they can be diagonally adjacent. The remaining un-filled cells must form a single component connected horizontally and vertically.</p><p>Real Hitori is a very elegant game, providing fabulous gameplay experience.</p><p>- Clean board, providing hours of pleasure gameplay; <br>- Handmade unique challenging games. All games and categories were designed to fit a 9x9 board without compromising quality and the need of zooming; <br>- No locked levels. Play whatever you want whenever you want;<br>- Autosave game. You don't need to worry if you don't have much time to play. It will automatically save all unfinished games; <br>- Simple menu context. Your game is just a few clicks away; <br>- No in app music. Real Code Breaker Mastermind  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Rottz+Games" title="Rottz Games">Rottz Games</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.rottzgames.mastermind"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIwohEh8KGWNvbS5yb3R0emdhbWVzLm1hc3Rlcm1pbmQQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Mastermind is a mind game that puts you in the position of a master code breaker: a secret code is given, and you must figure it out using guesses and the hints provided on the puzzle.<p><br>Real Code Breaker is based on the classic board game that is also known as Mastermind, Master Mind, Code Puzzle game and Bulls &amp; Cows.</p><p><br>Check our How To Play video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=McUP8PZNIxk</p><p><br>Features:<br>- BOARDS: 480 free puzzles. All boards are free!<br>- DIFFICULTIES: 3 difficulties: Easy, Medium and Hard. The harder the bigger the secret code is - extra challenge!<br>- MODES: on medium you will face repeated colors, while on hard you will face both repeated colors and empty pins.<br>- AUTO-SAVE: match is always automatically saved so you can continue later your master mind match.<br>- SIMPLE: easy and intuitive interface.</p><p><br>How to Play:</p><p><br>On each round you have to make a guess using colored pegs to try to solve the secret code, and you will get hints based on how well your guess was. For each pin that was an exact match you will get a Black hint pin. For each color that you got the color right, but is on the wrong position, you get a White hint pin.</p><p><br>By analyzing and comparing past rounds you will improve your code breaking guess continually until you figure out the full secret code.</p><p><br>Enjoy another brain puzzle from the makers of the Real Jigsaw hit (the #1 jigsaw app) and several other brain challenging games such as Real Einstein's Riddle, Real Kakuro, Real Sudoku, Real Nonogram and Gridbreaker. </div>  <div class="description">  新時代卡通萌物——YoYo，集可愛，搞笑，怪咖於一身的YoYo再次席捲而來。我和我的小伙伴們都驚呆了，你呢？<p>變裝YoYo動態壁紙是一款可以隨意更換服裝、表情、場景、頭飾等元素的百變桌布應用，你可以隨心所欲的更換YoYo的造型和場景來裝扮您的桌布，使你的桌布看起來更酷、更有愛、更搞怪。</p><p>YoYo動態桌布使用說明:<br>&nbsp;(一) 請確保手機使用的是android 2.1及以上系統。</p><p>&nbsp;(二) 如何使用【變裝YoYo動態桌布】？<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;方法1：啟動本程序後選擇【設置】，然後選擇【變裝YoYo動態桌布】；<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;方法2：安裝後按【MENU】-&gt;【桌布】-&gt;【動態桌布】-&gt;【變裝YoYo動態桌布】裡就可以設置；</p><p>&nbsp;(三) 變裝YoYo動態桌布的特點？<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;可以通過選擇不同的服裝和表情來裝扮YOYO，然後選擇“OK”保存，這樣就可以隨您使喚啦！搭配上我們開發的小部件效果更佳喔！</p><p>&nbsp;(四) 如果想獲取更多實用的軟件或好玩遊戲，請點擊【更多應用】。</p><p>&nbsp;如果有發現任何問題，您可以通過發送郵件到LOLDT.com@Gmail.com，我們會盡快處理， 謝謝!</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=nl.tengen.gridmaster" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=nl.tengen.gridmaster" title="Go GridMaster (Baduk, Weiqi)"> 323.    Go GridMaster (Baduk, Weiqi)  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Erik+van+der+Werf" title="Erik van der Werf">Erik van der Werf</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="nl.tengen.gridmaster"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHgocEhoKFG5sLnRlbmdlbi5ncmlkbWFzdGVyEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  GridMaster is a graphical user interface for the game of Go (Igo, Baduk, Weiqi). It contains a full featured SGF reader/editor, a lite version of the 9x9 Olympic Champion Go program Steenvreter (it also plays larger boards), and a Go Text Protocol (GTP) interface to connect any other gtp-compatible engine. It can be used as a tool to play, study Joseki, solve Go problems, make diagrams, annotate games, etc. <p>If you are new to the game of Go, an introduction as well as some links to more information is included in the help.</p><p>Here's a non-exhaustive list of features:<br>- Full featured SGF reader/editor (perhaps the only Android app to support *all* properties in SGF4)<br>- Includes a fairly strong artificial opponent (Steenvreter lite, level configurable) <br>- Support for ARM and Intel cpu's<br>- Ability to add other bots such as GnuGo, Pachi, or perhaps your own GTP engine<br>- Tool for reviewing games (easy to rate moves/states, add comments, links, game info, etc.)<br>- Quickly opens large SGF files such as Kogo's Joseki Dictionary<br>- Supports all rectangular board sizes up to 52x52<br>- Tips at start-up (can be turned off)<br>- Accurate stone placement even on small screens<br>- Correct wrong input by shifting stones<br>- Zoom in to show only some part of the board (by pinching)<br>- Zoom out to show the game tree<br>- Fast navigation through the game tree (button push+slide action)<br>- Auto-replay games at configurable rate (long-click forward to start).<br>- Collection support (i.e., multiple game trees in one file)<br>- Share option<br>- Copy-paste variations/games (also between applications as sgf text)<br>- Configurable rules (Chinese / Japanese)<br>- Configurable timing (Absolute / Canadian / Japanese / Stopwatch)<br>- Configurable sound for stone placement (tic, volume/pitch or system beep)<br>- Portrait &amp; landscape modes<br>- Various graphics options (e.g., switch to black&amp;white view, adjust line/button/hoshi size, toggle coordinates, etc.)<br>- Indicate last/next move (configurable from settings)<br>- Extensive help, includes an introduction to Go<br>- Optional debug tab shows GTP streams (the communication between GUI and engine), rules issues, and provides option to send gtp commands manually (double-tap to pop up dialog).</p><p>If something doesn't work, just drop me an email. Suggestions for improvement are always welcome.</p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=nl.tengen.gridmaster" aria-hidden="true" Connect Four Fun  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=TMSOFT" title="TMSOFT">TMSOFT</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.tmsoft.connectfour"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIAoeEhwKFmNvbS50bXNvZnQuY29ubmVjdGZvdXIQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Connect Four Fun is the classic two-player game of four in a row.  Two players take turns dropping their color checkers into one of the slots at the top of the board. Win the game by getting 4 or more of your color checkers either vertically, horizontally, or diagonally.<p>FEATURES<br>•	One or Two Players – Play against a friend or the computer.<br>•	Multiple Rounds – Win 3 rounds to win the game.<br>•	Computer Difficulty – Play against computer with Easy, Medium, Hard, Pro, and Expert difficulty.<br>•       Achievements - Collect all 5 by beating the computer player on each difficulty level.<br>•       Statistics View - Displays game stats and awards<br>•       Google+ Integration <br>•	Multiple Themes – Switch the color scheme to Modern, Classic, Night, Retro, and Hot.<br>•	Classic Board Size of 7x6 (7 columns, 6 rows, 4 chips in a row wins)<br>•	Realistic sounds effects<br>•	Smooth animations of checkers<br>•	It’s a free game!</p><p>INSTRUCTIONS<br>•	Select One or Two Players to start game<br>•	Each player takes their turn by tapping a column on the board to drop a checker<br>•	Round finishes when a player gets four in a row or there are no more moves<br>•	Tap the screen to play again<br>•	Win 3 rounds to win the game.</p><p>Send us feedback by tapping settings and then the Send Feedback Button. <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="jp.co.ultimaarchitect.android.fourinarow.free"> <div class="pon" is very easy to learn, but hard to master.<br>Challenge your strategic skills with 4 in a Row!<p><br>===== FEATURES =====<br>* 1-player mode (Human vs CPU)<br>* 2-players mode (Human vs Human).<br>* Watching mode (CPU vs CPU).<br>* 10 levels of difficulty.<br>* Scoreboard and rating system.<br>* Support tablet size devices. You can enjoy with your family or friends in a tablet!</p><p><br>===== GAME RULES =====<br>* Each player in his turn drops one of his discs down any of the slots in the top of the grid. <br>* The play alternates until one of the players gets four discs of his color in a row. The four in a row can be horizontal, vertical, or diagonal.<br>* The first player to get four in a row wins. <br>* If the board is filled with discs and neither player has four in a row, then the game is a draw.</p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=jp.co.ultimaarchitect.android.fourinarow.free" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a> href="/store/apps/details?id=com.davCo.oxomium" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.davCo.oxomium" title="OXOmium - Strategic TicTacToe"> 336.    OXOmium - Strategic TicTacToe  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=DavCo" title="DavCo">DavCo</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.davCo.oxomium"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaGwoZEhcKEWNvbS5kYXZDby5veG9taXVtEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  OXOmium is a 2-player game played on board strategy. It revisits the famous game of TicTacToe, but with more strategy and more fun. In OXOmium there are 9 small tictactoes forming a huge TicTacToe 3x3. However, it is not only 9 tictactoes side by side; Players control what tictactoe the other must play according to their last moves!<br> <br>To win the game, same principle as a normal tic tac toe, align in this super TicTacToe 3 small won tictactoes (line, column or diagonal). It is also called Ultimate TicTacToe or ultimate noughts and crosses.<p>Highlights:<br>★ Easy  as TicTacToe<br>★ Strategic  as real Board Game<br>★ 5 artificial intelligence levels<br>★ Play on the same Phone with your friends and family</p><p><br>Rules<br>To win the game, you have to win 3 small tictactoe in raw.<br>This is not only 9 tictactoe side by side.</p><p> The problem?  The tictactoe to play in isn't random selected. Players control what tictactoe the other must play according to their last move. For example, if the first player plays a cross in the lower right, the 2nd player must play in the bottom right tictactoe. This rule adds a lot of fun and surprise in the game!</p><p> When a small tictactoe is won , a large nought or cross is displayed transparently over the little tictactoe, for that he was won by the corresponding player. If there are still some blanks in, players can still send in opponent.</p><p> If a small tictactoe is full  (no empty square) and a player is still sent in, he can then play wherever he wants in the tray.</p><p><br>Find more details about the rules here : http://oxomium.com</p><p>Game made with ♥  from Paris.</p><p>♥ More questions about OXOmium ? Contact us at contact@oxomium.com,<br>Find us online:<br>Official website &gt;&gt;&gt; http://oxomium.com ; <br>Facebook page &gt;&gt;&gt; https://www.facebook.com/oxomium</p><p>Other reference to Ultimate TicTacToe: http://mathwithbaddrawings.com/2013/06/16/ultimate-tic-tac-toe/</p><p>Keywords: noughts and crosses, Tic Tac Toe, strategic, ultimate,  board, ultimate noughts and crosses, OXO, utilmate OXO, supertictactoe,</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" title="Seven Castles"> 341.    Seven Castles  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=7cities" title="7cities">7cities</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="air.com.ccson.Transylvania"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaJAoiEiAKGmFpci5jb20uY2Nzb24uVHJhbnN5bHZhbmlhEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  "Seven Castles" is a real-time, multiplayer board game in which you build castles, roads or cloisters by placing tiles on the board. You get points every time you complete a castle, road or cloister which you have occupied by placing your follower on it.<p>You can log in using your Gmail address or your Facebook account.<br>With Gmail login the user name part of your Gmail address will be displayed in the game.<br>With Facebook login your Facebook name will be displayed.</p><p>After successful login you will find yourself in the Lobby area. <br>Here you see a list of users currently online - the Lobby list- and a list of the ongoing games - the Games list. <br>You can invite other people to play or you can join an existing unlocked game.<br>If you are new to the game I recommend playing a Demo game first.</p><p>Disclaimer:<br>As this is a real-time game you need a decent mobile internet connection to play the game without issues. Bandwidth is not important but reliability is - network dropouts can break your game especially when it's your turn.</p><p>Classic games - these are based on the Carcassonne board game </p><p>- Mini game: 35 tiles, 5 meeples<br>- Base game: 72 tiles, 7 meeples<br>- First expansion: 90 tiles, 8 meeples<br>- Double base game: 144 tile, 10 meeples<br>- Double expansion: 180 tiles, 12 meeples</p><p>Castle games - in these you can build castle walls</p><p>- Castles Mini - 37 tiles, 5 meeples<br>- Castles - 70 tiles, 7 meeples<br>- CastlesPlus - 100 tiles, 9 meeples<br>- Double Castles - 140 tiles, 10 meeples</p><p>You can buy credits in Google Play to play bigger games - 10 credits cost about $1.<br>Credits are only deduced for completed games. <br>If the owner of the game - the one who pays for it - leaves before the end f the game no credits are lost.</p><p>How to play</p><p>Place your tile so that it matches the existing ones.</p><p>You can rotate with the rotate button on the right side. The tile will only rotate into good positions.</p><p>Put one of your players (the little avatars at the top) on the tile by clicking on a red circle. This way you can occupy a castle, road, cloister or field (an entity).</p><p>Click 'Submit' - the program will warn you if the tile doesn't match or if the entity was already occupied.</p><p>When you complete an occupied entity you get points for it and your player(s) are returned.</p><p>Scores</p><p>The program automatically calculates the scores for you - so the rules are listed here just for information.</p><p>During the game you get points when you complete a castle, road or cloister occupied by you. For fields you only get points at the end of the game.</p><p>If more than one player is present in a castles or road, the one that outnumbers the others will get all the points. If they have the same number of players in the castle all the players get the points.</p><p>For a completed castle you get 2 points per tile and 2 points per pennant (court of arms).</p><p>For a completed road you get 1 point per tile.</p><p>For a completed cloister you get 9 points. The cloister is completed when all its sides are connected i.e. there are no empty places around it.</p><p>End of game score</p><p>The game ends when all tiles are placed. Then you get points for uncompleted castles, roads and cloisters, but only one per tile. Also pennants are not counted then.</p><p>At the end you also get points for fields - 3 points for each completed castle that borders on your field.</p><p>For an uncompleted castle you get 1 point per tile.</p><p>For an uncompleted road you get 1 point per tile.</p><p>For an uncompleted cloister you get 1 point per neighboring tile.</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=air.com.ccson.Transylvania" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  </div> </div>     <div class="reason-set"> Sudoku Epic  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Kristanix+Games" title="Kristanix Games">Kristanix Games</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" class="description">  Sudoku Epic是一款融合五种不同玩法的免费sudoku（数独）游戏：普通9x9、迷你6x6、Wordoku（也被称作字母Sudoku）、Killer Sudoku和每日soduko挑战。Killer Sudoku是sodoku和kakuro的美妙结合。Wordoku用字母替代数字，谜题中的单词可作为提示。<p>Sudoku Epic有数千个谜题和挑战目标，是锻炼大脑的完美应用程序！</p><p>特色：</p><p>• 五种Sudoku游戏模式！<br>• 数千个免费sudoku谜题！<br>• Killer Suduko：适合解谜高手！<br>• Wordoku：找到隐藏的单词！<br>• 每天都有新谜题！<br>• 自动备注<br>• 完成目标！<br>• 五种难度设置！<br>• 获得提示！</p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.kristanix.android.sudokuepic2" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  </div> It can be use as a tool to improve your tactical skills and as well as a way to relive some of the decisive moments in chess history. The application can be used offline. With each version more puzzles will be added<p>IMPORTANT:<br>In order to improve your experience with "Chess Tactics", please write us your feedback, especially in case you give a bad rating (the feedback can be sent as well by email or on the app facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/chesstacticsapp). </p><p>Please check as well the "Chess Tactics for black" app!<br>https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.vv.ctfb</p><p>Chess quotes:<br>"In chess, as in life, a man is his own most dangerous opponent." - Vassily Smyslov</p><p>"Chess is 99% tactics."  -  Rudolph Teichmann</p><p>"Good players develop a tactical instinct, a sense of what is possible or likely and what is not worth calculating."  -  Samuel Reshevsky</p><p>"No matter how much theory progresses, how radically styles change, chess play is inconceivable without tactics."  -  Samuel Reshevsky</p><p>"Tactics involve calculations that can tax the human brain, but when you boil them down, they are actually the simplest part of chess and are almost trivial compared to strategy."  -  Garry Kasparov</p><p>"Tactics flow from a superior position."  -  Bobby Fischer</p><p>"In general I consider that in chess everything rests on tactics. If one thinks of strategy as a block of marble, then tactics are the chisel with which a master operates, in creating works of chess art."  -  Tigran Petrosian</p><p>"...one other thing is the GM's superiority in tactics. For example Christiansen can find tactics in any position. If you're a GM you should be able to overpower the IM tactically. The GM will often blow out the IM in this area. " - Nick de Firman</p><p>"If the student forces himself to examine all the moves that smite, however absurd they look at first glance, he is on the way to becoming a master of tactics."  -  Cecil data-cover-large="https://lh4.ggpht.com/3AT6oIkTRKedElgIbb1ONr1VWNoR_4hM2SH3w26NkoaeVlCVGB1TcJPjV8Dn8O8R594=w340-rw" data-cover-small="https://lh4.ggpht.com/3AT6oIkTRKedElgIbb1ONr1VWNoR_4hM2SH3w26NkoaeVlCVGB1TcJPjV8Dn8O8R594=w170-rw" href="/store/apps/details?id=air.EgyptianSenetFree" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=air.EgyptianSenetFree" title="埃及赛尼特棋 （古埃及游戏）- 神秘的来世之旅"> 350.    埃及赛尼特棋 （古埃及游戏）- 神秘的来世之旅  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Ezzat+Studios" title="Ezzat Studios">Ezzat Studios</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="air.EgyptianSenetFree"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHwodEhsKFWFpci5FZ3lwdGlhblNlbmV0RnJlZRABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  ◆ 电子娱乐与游戏2013年世界最高奖提名。<br>◆ 2013年W3奖银奖得主。<br>◆ 2013年埃及电子内容奖冠军得主。<br>◆ 2012年埃及游戏大赛优胜者。<p>在你的木乃伊上完成了开口仪式后，你就开始了你的来世之旅，历经奥西里斯的冥界，挑战一个无形的对手，他藏身在帝后谷的隐秘埃及墓穴中，尼罗河西面对岸底比斯（卢克索）更有名的帝王谷就在附近。</p><p>赛尼特棋是一种源于前王朝时代和古埃及的棋盘游戏，是双陆棋、西洋跳棋和国际象棋国际一类游戏已知最早的记录。代表赛尼特棋的最古老象形文字可追溯到公元前3500年左右。游戏的埃及语全名意为“穿行棋”。</p><p>棋类游戏已经存在了大约几千年左右，但没有一个比埃及人在大约3500到5000年之前发明的古赛尼特棋古老。据认为，这种双人棋盘游戏最初的起源是一个在皇家和平民中都很流行的娱乐形式。但是到了公元前13世纪中叶，赛尼特棋已经逐渐发展成一个更加宗教性的仪式。这个时期流传下来的一些描述表明，棋局不是两个人下的，而是由已经不在人世的棋手和一个无形的对手对垒，有人将其诠释为已故棋手自己灵魂的化身。</p><p>棋盘已经成为一种来世的象征，棋子在棋盘上移动，就像死后灵魂走过层层阴间。游戏的目标是达到最后的空格并离开棋盘，正如埃及人死后的目标就是到达荷鲁斯并离开阴间。</p><p>埃及赛尼特棋是一种结合了运气和策略的游戏，很有挑战性，具有逼真的古埃及神庙照片，还有制作精美的古老石棋盘和棋子图形和动画，就放在一间余音缭绕的墓室中。宗教音乐和石块移动的音效再现了埃及前王朝的氛围。</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=ZingMagic+Limited" title="ZingMagic Limited">ZingMagic Limited</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.zingmagic.chessvfree"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIgogEh4KGGNvbS56aW5nbWFnaWMuY2hlc3N2ZnJlZRABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  不論您的遊戲級別如何，ZingMagic 多次獲獎的國際象棋對新手和世界冠軍來說都是一種刺激的挑戰性遊戲。<p>國際象棋是一種歷史悠久的雙玩家遊戲，可追溯到其印第安祖先 - 恰圖蘭卡 (Chaturanga)。1291 年，英國坎特伯雷的大主教曾以粗茶淡飯來威脅那些沉迷於國際象棋的教士。<br>此遊戲盛行多年，是目前世界上最流行的棋盤遊戲之一，需要思考、技巧和策略才能獲得成功。</p><p>國際象棋的目標是俘獲對手的國王。要俘獲國王，您必須使其處於被將軍地位。如果國王無法自己或者在其軍隊的幫助下逃脫而被將死，則表明國王已被俘獲。</p><p>ZingMagic 多次獲獎的國際象棋應用程式因其具備優秀的可玩性而享有盛譽，適合從入門級到專家級的所有玩家。不論您的象棋級別如何，請您相信 ZingMagic 的國際象棋遊戲可以帶給您充滿刺激性和挑戰性的體驗。</p><p>遊戲特色:<br>*在同一裝置上與電腦或其他玩家進行對戰。<br>*榮獲獎項的人工智能引擎，在專家級時效能尤其超群。<br>*採用所有國際象棋規則，例如吃過路兵 (en passant captures)、王車易位 (castling)、升變 (under promotion)、循環和局 (draw by repetition)、長將 (perpetual check)、50 步規則 ( 50 move rule) 等。<br>* 支援備用棋盤和棋子。<br>* 撤銷和重複全部棋步。<br>* 顯示上一棋步。.<br>* 顯示合規棋步。<br>* 顯示危險的棋子。<br>* 提示。<br>*國際象棋是我們眾多經典棋盤遊戲、紙牌和益智遊戲中的一種，這些遊戲廣泛適用於各種平台。</p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.zingmagic.chessvfree" Forget about becoming a millionaire, now you can become a Zillionaire!<p>In Zillionaire for TANGO, there’s a chance that anything can happen! Roll the dice to decide your fate! no-rationale square-cover apps small"> <div class="card-content id-track-click id-track-impression" data-docid="ru.appforge.domino" data-server-cookie="CAIaHAoaEhgKEnJ1LmFwcGZvcmdlLmRvbWlubxABGAM=" data-uitype="500">  <a class="card-click-target" data-server-cookie="CAIaHAoaEhgKEnJ1LmFwcGZvcmdlLmRvbWlubxABGAM=" data-uitype="500" href="/store/apps/details?id=ru.appforge.domino" aria-hidden="true" data-cover-large="https://lh4.ggpht.com/eVJfXviQNZxhsNIn3M6e4PKSJogHQk4AmanbxsI0804JfKn1QHjXeSrUtIUVQs7L4BBf=w340-rw" data-cover-small="https://lh4.ggpht.com/eVJfXviQNZxhsNIn3M6e4PKSJogHQk4AmanbxsI0804JfKn1QHjXeSrUtIUVQs7L4BBf=w170-rw"
